thread.title: MR D HUGHES
thread.title_full: Rapid Formations reviewed by MR D HUGHES

author: MR D HUGHES
title: MR D HUGHES
text:
They do exactly as the advertising says. Everything done for me, I didn't have to do anything apart from fill out the initial online forms and prove my identity. This is the second time I've used them.
This means I can just focus on the 'business' as they do what they do best and I do what I do best!!
